original_title: Excise officer arrested for distorting New Year song and sharing on social media
original_body_lines: A 31-year-old from Wariyapola has been arrested for allegedly singing a distorted version of the ‘Soorya Mangalya’ New Year song by Rohana Beddage and sharing it on social media, police said.
The arrested individual is said to be an Excise Officer who is residing in the Wariyapola area.
